entities: The Committee established pursuant to resolution 751 (1992)
summary:
Expands the mandate of the Committee to:
- Monitor implementation of measures (paragraph 18(a))
- Designate individuals or entities subject to measures (paragraph 18(b))
- Consider requests for exemptions (paragraph 18(c))

Expands the mandate of the Monitoring Group to:
- Monitor and report on implementation of measures (paragraph 19(a))
- Assist the Committee (paragraph 19(b))
- Coordinate with other Sanctions Committees (paragraph 19(d))

Requests:
- Member States to report on steps taken to implement measures within 120 days (paragraph 20)
- Secretary-General to report on Eritrea’s compliance within 180 days (paragraph 22)

Affirms:
- It shall keep Eritrea’s actions under review and adjust measures as necessary (paragraph 21)

Decides to remain actively seized of the matter (paragraph 23).
